short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: This extension makes Paydirt's Time Tracker sidebar easier to navigate, especially if you have a lot of active projects.
short.de: Mit dieser Erweiterung ist die 'Time Tracker Sidebar' leichter zu verwalten, insbesondere wenn viele Projekte existieren.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
This extension minimizes all projects by default and lets you open them via click on the title bar.

Simple.
Easy.
Efficient.

Now with client tabs and fixes for paydirtapp's 'hidden blue popup'.

UPDATES:

  30.03.15 - 0.2.0:
    * added client tabs to narrow down the project list
    * centering opened projects
    * options page to make everything configurable
    * small improvements of paydirtapp's UI

  23.03.15 - v0.1.4:
    * adapted to the new Time Tracker Layout
    * redesigned buttons to fit better with the overall theme
    * improved performance

DISCLAIMER
===========
I am not in any way affiliated with paydirtapp, this is NOT an official Paydirtapp extension by the provider itself, i am merely an avid user who wanted to ‘fix’ the few little shortcomings this really great page has in my personal opinion.
long.de:
Diese Erweiterung minimiert standardmässig alle Projekte in der sidebar. Durch einen Klick auf den Titel eines Projektes klappt dieses dann wieder auf.
Simpel.
Einfach.
Effizient.
